value.string:
"""FIXME: this script uses standard categories, but not membership criterion
 category list. This assumes that an interaction workflow is copying membership
 categories into standard categories. Afterall, this might not be needed and we_
 can probably get them from membership criterion category list.
 """
 
 consumed_budget = context.BudgetCell_getConsumedBudget()
 
 mcbcl = context.getMembershipCriterionBaseCategoryList() 
 
 kw = dict(
 src__=src__,
 from_date=context.getStartDateRangeMin(),
 at_date=context.getStartDateRangeMax(),
 simulation_state = ['confirmed', 'delivered', 'stopped', 'started']
 )
 
 parent = context.getParentValue()
 
 # node
 if 'destination' in mcbcl:
 kw['node_uid'] = context.getDestinationUid()
 
 # node category
 if parent.isMemberOf(
 'budget_line_variation/budget_variation/node_category_financial_section'):
 kw['node_category'] = parent.getFinancialSection(base=1)
 if parent.isMemberOf(
 'budget_line_variation/budget_variation/node_category_budget_section'):
 kw['stock.function_uid'] = parent.getBudgetSectionUid() #(base=1)
 kw['node_category'] = parent.getBudgetSection(base=1)
 
 # mirror node
 if context.getSourceUid():
 kw['mirror_node_uid'] = context.getSourceUid()
 
 # mirror node category
 
 # section category
 if (context.isMemberOf(
 'budget_cell_variation/budget_variation/section_category_group') or
 context.isMemberOf(
 'budget_line_variation/budget_variation/section_category_group')):
 kw['section_category'] = context.getGroup(base=1)
 elif (context.isMemberOf(
 'budget_cell_variation/budget_variation/section_category_region') or
 context.isMemberOf(
 'budget_line_variation/budget_variation/section_category_region')):
 kw['section_category'] = context.getRegion(base=1)
 
 # mirror section category
 if (context.isMemberOf(
 'budget_cell_variation/budget_variation/mirror_section_category_group') or 
 context.isMemberOf(
 'budget_line_variation/budget_variation/mirror_section_category_group')):
 kw['mirror_section_category'] = context.getGroup(base=1)
 elif (context.isMemberOf(
 'budget_cell_variation/budget_variation/mirror_section_category_region') or 
 context.isMemberOf(
 'budget_line_variation/budget_variation/mirror_section_category_region')):
 kw['mirror_section_category'] = context.getRegion(base=1)
 
 
 if (parent.isMemberOf('budget_cell_variation/budget_variation/budget_line_type')):
 if parent.getBudgetLineType() == 'expense':
 kw['explanation_portal_type'] = ['Purchase Order', 'Purchase Invoice Transaction', 'Purchase Packing List']
 elif parent.getBudgetLineType() == 'income':
 kw['explanation_portal_type'] = ['Sale Order', 'Sale Invoice Transaction', 'Sale Packing List']
 return -context.portal_simulation.getInventory(**kw) 
 
 return context.portal_simulation.getInventory(**kw)
